ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Why is HTTP hard to design with?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, how about a new approach. Let s say you and I each have an SMTP, FTP, and HTTP server on our machines.  Without any further agreement between us, which one

Ok, how about a new approach.

Let's say you and I each have an SMTP, FTP, and HTTP server on our
machines.  Without any further agreement between us, which one can be
used to do the most things?

MB
